effects.title: Redistribution of Body Fat
effects.summary: Beginning between months 3 and 6 of therapy, you may experience a redistribution of body fat to different areas of your body, e.g. your breasts, with a maximum effect often seen in 2-3 years.

effects.title: Decrease in muscle mass and strength
effects.summary: Beginning between months 3 and 6 of therapy, you may experience a decrease in your muscle mass and/or strength, with a maximum effect often seen in 1-2 years.

effects.title: Softening of skin/decreased oiliness
effects.summary: Beginning between months 3 and 6 of therapy, you may start to see your skin soften and become less oily.

effects.title: Decreased sexual desire
effects.summary: Beginning between months 1 and 3 of therapy, you may start to experience a decrease in your sexual desire or arousability, but this will usually won't increase past months 3 and 6 of your treatment.

effects.title: Decrease in spontaneous erections
effects.summary: Beginning between months 1 and 3 of therapy, you may start to experience a decrease in the amount of spontaneous erections that occur, this decrease will begin to stay the same between months 3 and 6 of your treatment.

effects.title: Breast Tissue Growth
effects.summary: Usually beginning between months 3 and 6 of your treatment, you may see the enlargement of your breasts, this usually continues until you enter years 2 and 3 of your treatment.

effects.title: Decreased Body Hair Growth
effects.summary: Usually starting with the sixth month of your treatment, you may see a decrease in the growth of the hair around your body, this decrease in growth will begin to level out between months 3 and 6 of your treatment. Often, for full hair removal you may need electrolysis or laser hair removal.

effects.title: Decreased testicular volume
effects.summary: You may notice your testicles have decreased in volume, this is perfectly normal! Often this will be seen between months 3 and 6 of your treatment, and will often stop happening around years 2 and 3.

effects.title: Skin oiliness/acne
effects.summary: Beginning within six months of treatment, you may notice oilier skin and acne, this may increase up until years 1 or 2 of treatment.

effects.title: Facial/body hair growth
effects.summary: Usually between months 6 and 12 of treatment you will begin seeing an increase in body hair and/or facial hair. This will often continue to increase until years four or five of your treatment.

effects.title: Scalp hair loss
effects.summary: You may start to notice loss of scalp hair between months 6 and 12 of treatment but this can often be prevented and treated with other medications.

effects.title: Increased muscle mass/strength
effects.summary: Between months 6 and 12 of treatment, your muscle mass and strength may start to increase. This increase will often continue until anytime between years 2 and 5 of your treatment.

effects.title: Fat redistribution
effects.summary: Between months 1 and 6 of treatment you may begin to see fat in different places, this is your body redistributing it! This will often continue until years two or five of your treatment.

effects.title: Cessation of menses
effects.summary: Between months 1 and 6, you may start to notice less bleeding during your menstrual cycles, it may stop all together! If you experience abnormally heavy bleeding, it is recommended you contact a gynecologist.

effects.title: Clitoral enlargement
effects.summary: Between months 1 and 6, you may start to notice your clitoris getting larger, this is perfectly normal! The clitoris will often continue getting larger until 1 or 2 years from the beginning of treatment.

effects.title: Deepening of Voice
effects.summary: Between months 6 and 12, you may start to notice your voice getting deeper, this usually continues until 1 - 2 years of treatment.
